name: The Rain Never Stops
description:
The tower is flooding!  Cling to life, and climb as high as you can in this brutal procedurally-generated platformer.

Controls:  A/D keys or left control stick to move, space or A/Y buttons to jump.

This game is in very early development, and as such bugs will be present.  Graphics and features are subject to change.  Stay tuned for a great deal of new content in the future!

Credits

TongueEnvy: Graphics, Sound Effects, Programming, Direction

Chase McWhirt: Lead Programmer, Music, Design
